name: Ibec
legal: Ibec is a limited liability company
memberOrga:
Information can be accessed via each of our sector groups:
http://www.ibec.ie/IBEC/BA.nsf/vPages/Home~business-sectors?OpenDocument
goal:
• Ibec is Ireland's national federation of business, industry and employers. It is the largest organisation of its kind in Ireland. Representing businesses of all sizes and across all regions and sectors of the Irish economy, Ibec engages with government, decision makers and policy stakeholders at national, EU and global level to shape positive conditions for enterprise, investment, economic growth and employment creation.
• In addition to our public affairs, policy development and engagement activities, Ibec offers a range of professional services and supports to our member companies.
• Ibec operates 38 dedicated sectoral trade associations.
• Ibec is the Irish national member federation of BusinessEurope.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Banking and financial services, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Consumers, Culture and media, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Ibec works to protect and promote the interests of Irish enterprise and to champion Ireland's business model and economic priorities at all levels within the EU Institutions.
